name: Peeu Blast
description:
Peeu Blast A series of peeus that defeat evil.

Is an arcade game developed for those who love challenges.

Humble your friends in the endless mode and climb the tower, looking for the keys ... the 3 keys.

Game Mode:

Endless

Tower (new)

  • Endless Mode:

     Accumulate points and coins in an endless arcade facing all
     available enemies immediately.

  • Tower Mode:

     Scale "The tower" to reach the top.

     Quiet, the first levels will not be difficult. But be careful, if they hit
     you will fall to the previous floor.

(great for speedrunners)

Enjoy a vast shop where you can choose the skin that best represents you.

Ridicule your enemies with the vastness of powers available in both modes.

Discover its secrets.


"Peeu Blast" is a product of rlpb.
